summary: Two boyhood friends are separated due to the disappearance of the sister of one of them, then later meet again as teenagers, when one of them has become a pop singer, and they discover feelings that they did not know they had.
cast: Sinjai Plengpanich|Songsit Roongnophakunsri|Pimpan Buranapim|Laila Boonyasak|Jirayu La-ongmanee|Arthit Niyomkul|Kanya Rattapetch|Aticha Pongsilpipat|Mario Maurer|Witwisit Hiranyawongkul|Pongnarin Ulice|Jarunee Boonsake|Nattapong Arunnate|Taveesak Pehtpraneenukul|Atirat Praseartburanakul|Atichart Pitisant|Chanon Rikulsurakan|Pathomwat Wansukprasert|Naphanthanut Poung Oomsin|Chalothorn Chomchan|Atthanan Piyaseth|Watcharit Avasiriphong|Voraphat Dejkajonwuth|Nattapong Navasinlawat|Suwapat Songsiangchai|Pasakorn Wiroonsup|Kingkarn Kerdkaew|Kaewkan Kaewvangsuang|Surapol Chonwilai|Salaithip Charubhumi|Metha Sereethanawongs|Thanaporn Amornsin|Aratee Piriyakijpiboon|Onsachee Silawan|Chookiat Sakveerakul|Sudarat Kingsala|Priew Pothiwijit|Jirode Suwongs|Thanachot Piensema|Prawed Narttanarung|Sakayod Tungjitpanich|Boriruk Kijthaweepituk|Tanun Udomchan|Pisit Chotjarangkul|Teemah Kanjanapairin|Prapun Wungphattanasirikul|Arnon Hongdalud|Somped Nuntasilapachai|Kiattiwat Srijanwanpen|Patcharin Srijanwanpen|Warinthorn Srijanwanpen|Warin Srijanwanpen|Pitak Paipol|Chaween Udnun|Pichet Sumetthaveenun|Piyarat Umnajtalerngsak|Chaiyapol Amornpitak|Suppich Kumtongsuk|Jareon Kasatereunpol|Witsarut Kaewbubna|Sorravi Manopetchkasem|Chayut Teeradakorn|Monthicha Srimonthok|Tapapat Buathianthong|Natthaphat Aksornphaisarn|Pathorn Leelaniramol|Smith Tsoi|Monotone Group
keywords: thailand|coming of age|sexual tension|thai culture|gay teenager

title: Rak haeng Siam
